subject: Triathlon
lead_paragraph: Lukas Verzbicas won the junior title at the world triathlon championships in Beijing on Sunday, fulfilling his goal of winning the gold medal in honor of a cancer-stricken friend and teammate.
snippet: Lukas Verzbicas won the junior title at the world triathlon championships in Beijing on Sunday, fulfilling his goal of winning the gold medal in honor of a cancer-stricken friend and teammate.
